trial_identification.studytitle: The reliability of Trail making test-Chinese version and Stroop color and word test in Taiwanese healthy elderly
trial_identification.scientifictitle: The reliability of Trail making test-Chinese version and Stroop color and word test in Taiwanese healthy elderly

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Studies of the normal brain and nervous system

interventions.interventions: Subjects will received tw0 test: Chinese version of the trail making test and Stroop color and word test twice in two weeks by researcher. Two kind of test are cognitive function test and they were used in some study in Taiwan.

primaryOutcome.outcome: test-retest reliability of chinese version of trail making test
primaryOutcome.timepoint: after received two kind of tests twice

primaryOutcome.outcome: test-retest reliability of chinese version of stroop color and word test
primaryOutcome.timepoint: after received two kind of tests twice

secondaryOutcome.outcome: outcome of chinese version of trail making test
outcome of chinese version of stroop color and word test

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
MMSE (MiniMental State Examination) scores above 24 points
age greater than 65 years old

sponsorship.primarysponsorname: Department of Physical Therapy and Assistive Technology, National Yang-Ming University, Taipei, Taiwan
sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: Department of Physical Therapy and Assistive Technology, National Yang-Ming University, 155, Sec. 2, Li-Nong Street, Shih-Pai, Taipei, Taiwan

fundingsource.fundingaddress: No.155, Sec.2, Linong Street, Taipei, 112 Taiwan (ROC)

ethicsAndSummary.summary: Trail making test and stroop color and word test are well-known cognitive function test. However they were English version. They may not be situated to applied on older adults in Taiwan. So, they were modified into Chinese version. The purpose of this study is to confirm the reliability of trail making test-Chinese version and stroop color and word test in older adults in Taiwan.
